message: I understand you want a larger share, but the value decreases for me each round. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
Considering the inflation, this is a reasonable adjustment
Alice, let's be reasonable.  The clock is ticking and this is the best offer you'll get considering the inflation working against me.
You're right, time is running out. This is my most generous offer yet
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering a perfectly even split.  Take it or leave it -  but every round costs us both.
